website_summaries.verdict: A super-comfy mattress that performs well as either a primary sleep system or for the guest bedroom.
pros: A comfortable memory foam mattress with a cooling gel layer that disperses body heat
Soft-cushioning top layer wraps shoulders and hips in comfort, while firm base layer provides underlying support
cons: Heavyweight sleepers may not find this mattress supportive enough

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: After reading oodles of negative reviews about all different mattresses on several different sites, I was worried about this purchase. Happily surprised—- no issues and my tall son says it’s SO comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: K.T./K.G.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure where customer service is...Ide assume they are on vacation?
customer_reviews.text: The mattress was set up as it was supposed to be, and yet after a few weeks of sleeping on it, I noticed the dip in the center just wont come out. I have reached out to them via email, and no response. Think I bought a lemon, and will be sending it back if I dont hear from them soon. Its does have a 10 yr warranty, which I am very glad to have. i only weigh 175 pounds, no reason for this. If I get an update from the seller, I will gladly post.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: The mattress itself is NOT an 8 inches mattress as advertised. My bed is way to low to sleep on, and can easily break the plaque that is underneath the mattress for support. As of now, I have no bed to sleep on because of this. Original delivery was suppose to be June 6, 2020; I received it June 5, 2020, but it is an incorrect item. It would be more appreciated to maintain efficiency rather than speed. especially during the COVID19 virus. It is more work to fix the issue than to maintain correct information/product for any client.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was excited but not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed. My first big purchase on Amazon and this was how I received it. Let the photos speak for itself. Right now I'm trying to get into touch with the right person to get rid of this.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Best Mattress I've Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: All the bad reviews I saw had me skeptical, but I gave it a shot, anyways. I'm glad I did. Sucks for the people that didn't like it. I think this mattress is the best I've ever slept on. On our old spring mattress, I would always toss and turn and wake up sore and needing to adjust, but on this mattress I fall asleep easily in any position and wake up well-rested in the same position. I love this. It shipped fast and was easy to set up. We waited 48 hours before letting anyone (pets included) lay on it. No issues with it inflating, no damage, no odors like some other reviewers experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t count on delivery date - Otherwise great!
customer_reviews.text: My first product review ever...! What smell? What disappointing wait for the mattress to come to life ...?! I did not experience either, worked out great for me. Product did not arrive on time, oh well I lived, whew....that was my big disappointment however, I purchased this as a bed to sleep on when moving and three nights on the floor in your fifties is without a doubt painful. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Not as described  Cheap and no support
customer_reviews.text: The mattress arrived on time It was packaged well It has sat for 5 days and is the softest foam I have ever felt If you lay on it it will co press all the way to the floor It has no support and is about like laying on the floor I have purchased 3 mattress from amazon always have a great experience this is the worst mattress I have ever payed on And I can’t get any help in resolving this Stay away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: This was my worst purchase from Amazon. The description was wrong, it was only 6 inches. Decided to give it a try instead of dealing with returning it but I should’ve returned it while I had the box. I could only handle sleeping on the mattress for a month before I couldn’t take it anymore. The return process is ridiculous. They expect us to fit it back in a box and packaged... Save you’re self time and money and don’t purchase this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable yet time consuming
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable bed once it expands to full size, that did take almost 4 days in a well ventilated room with 2 fans. It did not expand to the full 8" our reached 7" at full expansion I will say that the customer service folks were very responsive and quick to rectify the situation. I ended up needed bed risers to give it the right height had I known that from the start I would have just purchased the 10". Customer service was fantastic! Bed is so very comfortable, switched from coil springs to this and I absolutely love it my back pain is gone!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Squillante

customer_reviews.title: Size Not As Described
customer_reviews.text: It's been several days, and I believe the mattress has stretched to its max at 6.5". I contacted the seller and was unable to include a picture on my response. The mattress is comfortable, but I think it could be better if it was true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Love it but then this happened!
customer_reviews.text: When we first got it, we were really happy with it, impressed about the whole process and of its comfort level. But I unzipped the top later the other day to put in the washer and that’s what it looked like underneath (photo attached). How is there so much wear and tear and this second layer in 9 months... is that normal? Had this happened to anyone else who bought it? I’m a little sad about it, because I was so proud and happy with my find!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the mattress
customer_reviews.text: The mattress came in a box, which we brought into the room before opening it. Several layers of plastic hold it tightly. Once opened, it was not that heavy to put in place on the bed. Ours had no smell whatsoever and seemed fully expanded within a few hours. It feels firm, yet soft. I don't feel like I'm sinking into the mattress, as you would think with a foam mattress. I've only napped on it a few times as it's actually on a bunk bed we bought for our grand daughters, but it feels really good.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Boecker

customer_reviews.title: False Advertisement
customer_reviews.text: So, 8 inches... huh... sure... This matress is at most 6 inches thick. if you sit down too hard you will hit the bed frame underneath. It is comfortable enough to sleep on when you're exhausted but you sink over the night. This matres is cheap. with the size only being maybe 6 inches, I want my money back for the 2 more inches I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This "mattress" won't even support my 110 lbs wife.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I just had back surgery, it was a horrible mistake. If I could I would send it back in a heartbeat. You can feel the box spring through it. It came vacuum sealed and rolled in a small box, so you cant even return it. It's more of a 8 inch mattress pad.
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: After sleeping on this mattress for a month now, it’s terrible. We’ve tried putting a box spring underneath, tried flipping the mattress to have the more firm side up. Definitely want to return this thing but returning a mattress that was bought online is such a hassle. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: These should not be considered a mattress my pillow is thicker
customer_reviews.text: It probably was on me not reading the little details but I got the 8 inch mattress. I assumed the Gel was 8 inches on top of the regular mattress but I ended up getting a mattress that is 8 inches in total. Save your money and get a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Misleading reviews
customer_reviews.text: Not the worst mattreess, especially for the price. However, it's not NEARLY as comfortable as all the reviews I read said it was. Again, not a bad mattress, looks nice, it works just fine- but I have to wonder if the reviews I read were paid for, which makes me more upset than the mattress itself. Don't expect "the best sleep ever , feels like a cloud etc" like I did or you'll be less than thrilled when you get it. Like I said though, you could do a lot worse for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cory D.

customer_reviews.title: I’m getting a good night sleep now
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new mattress. I never brought on line . But I needed to . So I went through reviews on a lot of mattresses. I chose this one. I unwrapped and left it do what it needed to do. I didn’t sleep on it the first night. My first night was not as good as I thought. It wasn’t full like a mattress should be. I felt the box spring . But after sleeping on it a couple of nights it got fuller I didn’t feel the box spring. I would recommend this mattress. Give a couple of nights to fully shape to size.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Kotzker

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't support a person weighing 310.
customer_reviews.text: I waited 72 hrs for the bed to fully rise up to 8 inches I made it as far as 7 inches. I'm really disappointed in this bed I read online reviews though it was a perfect match especially with price I just had a baby thought my back problems would kinda get better or make it feel Good when I sleep at night but it made it worst. I couldn't even push my self out of bed this morning cause I was in so much pain. I saw one review saying it supports 375 weight. I don't think it's true I weight 310 and it hurts my back.
customer_reviews.author: April Saragosa

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected from a mattress bought online. Rolled out and fluffed you’re immediately and didn’t have an odor. I was very hesitant with reading the reviews but am glad I went with my gut and took a chance in this. Ended up buying a twin and king size as well for the other rooms in our house. All expanded to their size right away and they didn’t have a strong odor. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Booknerd

customer_reviews.title: excellent packaging.  I highly recommend these matresses (beds in a box)
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything, the packaging was very professional and upon opening box #1, I found no odor and loved the way the mattress expanded itself. I ordered another one 3 days later. These mattresses are lightweight but hold a firmness for a great night's sleep. They are also very attractive and can be easily vacuumed. Buy two, one on top of the other is the perfect twin XL size. Get rid of that old box spring which is so heavy, you can barely move it to clean under and around. These mattresses are easy to shift and lift to upright position for cleaning properly.
customer_reviews.author: patrice moynihan

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE  RIP-OFF
customer_reviews.text: Product was damaged upon delivery. Mattress has a terrible smell for several days (even with the windows opened). The mattress does NOT provide any back, side support and sags when 1 adult (6 feet tall, 165lbs) lies in the middle. Amazon is being EXTREMELY difficult in refunding my purchase! Do NOT buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Timo Cervantez

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable, we have 2 of these twins and 1 king size bed!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best bed I have ever purchased. This is extremely affordable and so comfortable. This brand is wonderful on how they make their products in the factory to being very comfortable as I have bad hip problems. My son has a twin bunk bed and has 2 of these mattresses. Perfect for adults and kids!! Best purchase I've made on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Onefitmom

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought it would be!
customer_reviews.text: As a person with various spine issues I was looking for a mattress that would conform to my body when I slept. A mattress that would not put pressure on my spine when I slept on my back! This mattress is not the mattress I hoped it would be. It’s hard and doesn’t give. It doesn’t smoosh down like a memory foam pillow when you push down on it. When I sleep on this mattress I wake up with so much pain in my back and it’s unbearable to move! It’s back to sleeping in the recliner!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Gower

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: So not waste your money the corners r still flat and the bed is so uncomfortable to sleep on I got the bed a week ago and though in the beginning I would give it a try by nope nothing has changed
customer_reviews.author: Sefik

customer_reviews.title: Not to bad
customer_reviews.text: Only slept for a couple of nights on it but so far so good. I just moved so it sits right on the floor. My old spring bed can’t compare it was seriously giving me back pain. Hope to get a couple of years out of this one, will update later
customer_reviews.author: Garbanzo

customer_reviews.title: Was this going to be what we expected??
customer_reviews.text: Ok my mattresses came right on time...they were easy to work with popped up easy no smell we left them out for 2 full days no smell they are amazing.. Our grand daughter layout on one of them and was in heaven... We got them for company coming at Thanksgiving so will know the comfort then unless I sneak and take a nap when no one is looking and some suggested about using cardboard on a trundle bed and we did and that was a good idea... there a little big but not a big deal... so we are happy so far will let you know ASAP what the outcome is thank you Molblly 8”
customer_reviews.author: nonie

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for our top bunk. I was hesitant due to some of the reviews but I'm happy with my purchase. Its surprisingly comfortable and decompressed very quickly. It shipped during the pandemic and arrived on time despite receiving a notification that it would be delayed. Over all, very impressed with the bed, price and seller. Thank you for the positive experience.
customer_reviews.author: Nickie

customer_reviews.title: Comfiest Mattress in a Budget !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress for my daughter who was complaining about her back hurting everyday, once she got her mattress set up she has been sleeping better and the back pains are completely gone. Highly recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: Susy Avila

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bed - It is just what I needed! I have looked and looked for mattresses and, to be honest, price didn’t matter... I’m glad I went with this one because it is just like a normal memory foam you’d buy from the store. It is very comfy, firm enough, but not tooo too firm to the point where my back is killing me. If you’re looking for a new mattress, save yourself some money because I’d recommend this in a minute!!
customer_reviews.author: James Huerbin

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Me and my partner sleep very comfortable. Because it is memory foam, it actually takes your weight and position. So for example, I am tiny and my partner is obviously heavier than me so his bed side is lower than mine. I am not sure if that is a good thing, but I take it that it's because the mattress is memory foam.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Adames

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Comfortable. My daughter love it.
customer_reviews.text: very nice. Inflated to the desired size. Using on the bunk bed and looks good. As mentioned it smells in the beginning. Leave it for 1-2 days and it will be fine. As it was certified to not to produce harmful gases so my kid started sleeping from first day. Thanks,
customer_reviews.author: Kalpesh pandey

customer_reviews.title: It’s priced right
customer_reviews.text: Was really hard to get out of package and very heavy other then that it’s great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bed is great.
customer_reviews.text: this bed is very comfortable. It’s FIRM but depending on your weight you probably could sink in it if ur a bit bigger. It was Brand new. No pest as I seen in previous reviews. Mines was true to size BUT I only got a 8 inch because I seen no one in previous reviews complained that their 8inch wasn’t true to size. & my man loves the bed as well & he complains about everything 😂
customer_reviews.author: Asia Blyther

customer_reviews.title: Too soft
customer_reviews.text: Almost too soft. Definitely need a box spring. My platform bedframe doesn't support this. Falls through slats
customer_reviews.author: MJ Harris

customer_reviews.title: This is the bed you’re looking for, I promise
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a few mattresses on amazon. I got this particular model for my dogs bed, and I am about to buy one for myself. Its so comfortable, sometimes I fall asleep next to him on this thing! Seriously, it is SO comfortable
customer_reviews.author: MentalNight

customer_reviews.title: The best night’s sleep
customer_reviews.text: Forms to your body. I have a bad back so I could never sleep on my back. With this mattress I can.
customer_reviews.author: Lennie

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Queen mattress. I let it be for 24/48 hours before sleeping on it for the first time last night. Over all, I slept great. I’ll update as time goes on. A little over a week later, it’s already developing a soft spot where I always sleep and doesn’t plump back up like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Beka

customer_reviews.title: Not sure yet
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is that it only opened up to about 7 inches. It says to give 72 hours to open but it has been 4 days waiting. It is nice and soft. Should work great. Haven't used yet but I knew it would be short I would have gone with the 10 inch mattress
customer_reviews.author: shaun tobin

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief and quality sleep
customer_reviews.text: The first night i was in so much pain from my activities of the day, installing flooring in my room. I laid down and by morning nothing hurt. All my pain had gone away. I didn't notice a smell to the mattress when i first opened it. I love the removable cover, soft. If i was to buy another one, I would choose a 10"/12" instead of an 8", only because I prefer my bed up higher, (like on risers, high). The 8" does what i needed so badly, to relieve my pain and get a great night's rest. 5*****star
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lynn Harris

customer_reviews.title: More like ‘medium’...not medium-firm
customer_reviews.text: Got this a couple of days ago and it’s nice! Packaging was great, no odor, and it expanded fairly quickly. I’m doing 4 stars because medium-firm is more like ‘medium’. But if it was a little firmer would be perfect (for me). Firmness is entirely subjective so don’t let my 4 stars distract you. It could easily be 5 stars to someone else. It arrived in perfect condition despite how rough shipping can be on products, especially something large and heavy’ish like this. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Giving it some time, if anything I will purchase a foam gel bed topper.
customer_reviews.text: Tonight will be the 3rd night, this morning I woke up with back pain. It definitely puts you to sleep right as soon as you lay down.
customer_reviews.author: Jovana De la Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small people.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress was ordered for my grandkid’s bed. I wanted something comfortable but not too expensive. This mattress fit the bill. My older kids have slept on it also and say it is actually quite comfortable. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our adult daughter, who is finicky about mattresses, Comfortable, plenty thick and cool. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Issa

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this mattress. I’ve ended up buying this same mattress for all of my kids, because the first liked it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: This mattress is the best one I have ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new mattress for my new apartment and with everything closed during the virus I was skeptical of finding one online. This mattress is the best one I have ever had. It conforms to me no matter how long I am sleeping or needing bedrest for my disability.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and great quality. I recommend this mattress. Its GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: MBenz71

customer_reviews.title: No need to pay any more, great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful memory foam mattress... at a great price! Exactly as expected, very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Eternal Reader

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Firm Support Mattress at Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Sounds like an oxymoron, but this Molblly Gel Memory foam is a comfortable Firm / Soft product and offers good support for weary spines. If you've typically enjoyed firm traditional box spring mattresses for sleeping, then this Molblly memory foam gel mattress is a good transition for you. (Hardly any odor; what slight one there was diminished completely during the 72 hour expansion time.)
customer_reviews.author: THEGina

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and by far the best bed!
customer_reviews.text: Great firm bed and a great price! You don't sink! I have had issues finding a mattress that doesn't sink or soften from body heat. Quite literally, probably have gone through 7 mattresses in the last 15 years. Will be buying the same mattress for master bedroom in a king. How can you beat $299 for a long size mattress that is probably the best one I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Its great it extended bto the size its supposed to, so fluffy and confy. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Carla p.

customer_reviews.title: A little thin
customer_reviews.text: It's only an 8" mattress but I don't feel like it should squish all the way down when it's laid on. Thank goodness the everyday user is only 4.5 years old. So, hopefully this should last until he's at least a preteen. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Moldy Smell
customer_reviews.text: I read the pamphlet that came with the mattress which said it might have a "slight smell" and if possible to leave the window open......what I have encountered is a strong smell of mildew and its been over a week in a ventilated room and the minute I open my front door the smell hits me in the face. It was very comfortable and was fantastic in every other way but it has got to go!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Davis

customer_reviews.title: Think twice
customer_reviews.text: My son was excited and looking forward to its arrival, however, the firmness of the matress already has him asking for a different one :(
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Fiberglass everywhere on everything
customer_reviews.text: Fiberglass everywhere very hard to clean have to use a bright light to see them in the air on walls on clothing impossible to wash just keeps spreading evwrywhere and on everything skin rashes and irritation stupid bad bed
customer_reviews.author: Ak907

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy, excellent price.
customer_reviews.text: Comfy bed. Not too heavy for moving the mattress by yourself. Excellent deal for the price. I now have a king size and queen size as a guest bed. Received the recommendation from my niece and mom. I took the chance thinking I might still need to buy a topper; no topper needed. Toughest part was waiting 72 hours to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Had to get another mattress to lay under this one since its SO thin and didnt expand to its full size.
customer_reviews.author: jason m.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress. So comfortable. Great price. Did I say comfortable? Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Olga L

customer_reviews.title: Really like it but two I just bought bought another one total of three
customer_reviews.text: Really like it but two I just bought bought another one total of three
customer_reviews.author: dave maserang

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: Mattress inflated all 8 inches in 24 hours. Feels very soft and comfortable, sure slept very good.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Olivares

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable best price.
customer_reviews.text: By far some of the best mattresses ever purchased the kids love them. They dont even want to sneak in moms bed anymore... by the way the price is phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Exactly what was expected. Super comfortable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable twin mattress
customer_reviews.text: These are for my trundle bed and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: T. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable mattress at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: RoxannLincoln

customer_reviews.title: 8 inch to thin
customer_reviews.text: Not firm enough, to thin, go with thicker than the 8 inch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the most comfortable thing I've ever slept on. For the price you cannot get better. No smell after one day with the window open. So comfortable, I have back problems and it cradles me to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed but boy does it stink.
customer_reviews.text: Idk what chemicals they used but my God it smells awful.... Nice bed tho. 👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Firmness for the back!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is comfortable beyond belief. I think I will never have the old type again. Besides being everything I need for my back and rotator cuff, this mattress was affordable. Thank you for the good nights sleep. And 'yes,' the mattress is rather firm. That happens to be ideal for my situation.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Firm but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress.great sleeping.no rolling.firm .easy to sit it up
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Sleep on it myself. Quite comfortable for me. Slept better the first night than I had in the last year.
customer_reviews.author: Slim man

customer_reviews.title: strong smell-Chest pains
customer_reviews.text: 0Stars. Horrible smell, chest pains every night!! Would love it but whatever this smell is seeps through layers of sheets comforter and clothing at 1.5 months later. The pain in my chest is huge concern. Money is an issue so... I should add that I often sleep away from matress on floor bc of chest pain from sleeping on matress.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly

customer_reviews.title: fantastic for the price
customer_reviews.text: The company sent a device that cut the shrink wrap without harming the mattress and the mattress expanded to 90% plus immediately. It was soft and fit perfectly for our wall bed. It is not easy to find something only 8" thick that is comfortable on a piece of plywood! This is a great produce. Our company slept well!.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother for her hospital style bed. She loves it and works well with her adjusted hospital style bed.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress, comfortable, easy to unpack
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son, quick delivery to my front door, easy to take out of box and unroll. Great product, comfortable, overall very happy
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Item shipped super quick and was so easy to set up! No more lugging a huge mattress into the house. Make sure you follow instructions and let the mattress sit AT LEAST 24 hours before laying on it. It feels like you're laying on a cloud!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: JUST BUY IT...NOW!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of bad reviews before I purchase this mattress. But guess what, this is an amazing mattress. I have no complains. All good here. I don't know what they were talking when they gave a bad review. JUST BUY IT... NOW!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Comfy! Affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mattress. Its comfy and supportive. BUT if i take one knee in the center the edge will bend up a bit. Im 190. I dont hit the frame underneath tho. But still like it for the price. Sleep like a baby.
customer_reviews.author: djtrujillo

customer_reviews.title: Good msttress
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 5th trailer that I live in. It sleeps good
customer_reviews.author: lioness

customer_reviews.title: A little to firm
customer_reviews.text: Im giving this mattress a 3 star because its a little to on the firm/harder side for me, i have a lower back pain and slept uncomfortably on it. Im hoping they will get back to me to see what options i have. Other than thatbthe shipping was great, i know it says wait 72 hours for the bed to be fully up but it was up in a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy a slat platform bed frame. It allows air to circulate throughout mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress! I'm 280 pounds and it's great to sleep on. I bought the King size and its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Really comfy but for a kid
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is not firm for a heavier person or a pregnant person. My kids all love it, the biggest kid is 135lbs. I myself found it not as firm as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: daisy

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress it is nice and comfortable my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: wuzma latifi

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: It is so comfy and expanded right away. Didn't need to wait more than a couple hours. No factory smell, either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Angels should be included!
customer_reviews.text: Sleeping on a cloud....never wake me up! Angels should be included 😇
customer_reviews.author: Lexter

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. It's for a spare bed so it doesn't get used much, but it is super comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable - Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our RV. Arrived on time and was easy to open and allow to decompress. Due to the summer heat, it took no time to get to normal size. Faint smell but it went away fast and was ready to sleep on within a day. I am so glad we bought this mattress - surprising good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dana G.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t get any more comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this mattress but after breaking it in for a little over a month now it hasn’t gotten any more comfortable. I have joint problems so comfort is a must and I still wake up sore. Have to invest in a mattress pad now!
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: Thank you this mattress is one of the best mattresses I have ever owned and slept on.Thank you
customer_reviews.author: melissa thompson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! 5/5 Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is my second mattress we have purchased a King and Queen size both are great. Would recommend to anyone looking for a memory foam mattress
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: A GOOD NIGHTS SLEEP
customer_reviews.text: purchased a molblly 8 inch. foam twin from amazon? /china ,, well pleased all aspects. A plus on all accounts price quality service.. Would purchase again.. a good mattress. thank you again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable.. it inflated perfect. No smell. I love it.. would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: ariana baccelli

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little sceptical at first, but a great mattress. Super comfy and soft. No smell after letting it air out, as directed. I could (and sometimes do) lay in it all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids bed!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about buying a mattress in a box, but after doing some research and reading reviews decided to give them a try. Very glad I did! Good value and great comfort. Grandkids love them!
customer_reviews.author: Barry Shoemake

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase and at a great price point compared to other options. We really had to have a bed-in-a-box for shipping reasons but after sleeping on this one, I would buy another happily.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I just didn’t like the corners of the mattress because it doesn't make the full format.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Coelho Rosa

customer_reviews.title: 5 STAR MATTRESS EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: A price is not too high as quality of this product. I would recommend this one to people who looking for some best mattress.. Sleep well, Relax, No any stressful and so softly. Super Cool!
customer_reviews.author: Vhanila Diva

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Actually bought 2 sizes. I was really skeptical about any box bed. Alot of them are way overpriced. So I gambled on this brand. And all honesty. The bed is super cozy. And the price is dynamite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you don’t like to sleep buy this mattress
customer_reviews.text: Have had this mattress now 3 months and never have I woke up in pain every morning. I will be throwing this away and buying something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress, Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Comfortable mattress no problems great mattress. Just bought a second for my daughters bed.
customer_reviews.author: G M

customer_reviews.title: You got to see it to believe it!
customer_reviews.text: Product well packaged and the mattress began to expand on removing plastic. Great value. Have bought more expensive mattresses in the past that weren’t that nice. Would buy again. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Queen Mattress, Molblly 8 inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress with CertiPUR-US Bed Mattress in a Box for Sleep Cooler & Pressure Relief, Queen Size
feature_bullets: {MATERIAL & CONSTRUCTION}: Molblly 8 inch Gel Memory Foam Mattress is designed with three layers all-foam system, improving support and heat dissipation, mattress layers include 2 inches memory foam, 2 inches of comfortable layer, and 4 inches of high density base support foam for ultimate comfort. It includes a soft hypoallergenic cover layer that is washable for your convenience.
{HEALTH & HYPOALLERGENIC MATTRESS}: The foam has been certified by CertiPUR-US and Oeko-Tex Standard 100 without harmful substances like formaldehyde, mercury, and other heavy metals.

{COMFORTABLE & BREATHABLE}: All-foam bed design combined expertise and the best materials with advanced sleep technology. Memory foam conducive to continuous airflow & breathable; skin-friendly fabrics adapt to the environment to keep the mattress surface at the ideal sleeping temperature; Buoyant, no-sink support foams adapt and conform to your body for optimal pressure relief; Specialized foams reduce motion transfer of a partner so your sleep is undisturbed.

{EASY SHIPPING & SET-UP}: Mattress is compressed and packaged in a box for shipping, allowing it to easily be delivered to your door and expand to its full lofty shape inside your home. They fit all frames, such as box spring, floor, slatted base, flat platform or adjustable bed, hospital bed.

{ WARRANTY}: We are a manufacturer specializing in the production and processing of mattresses, We also have professional production and R&D teams. guarantee the best price mattress you can get. Our bed mattress come with 10 years warranty. If for any reason you are unsatisfied, contact us at any time for support. NOTE: Please allow up to 72 hours for the mattress to fully expand and for any potential odors to dissipate.
